summary: Phase 1 features testing completed successfully. All advanced filters, order tracking, product reviews, footer links, and legal pages are working correctly.
passed_tests: ✓ Advanced filters on CategoryPage - Price filter with 6 ranges
✓ Advanced filters on CategoryPage - Color filter with swatches
✓ Advanced filters on CategoryPage - Brand filter (Apple, Samsung)
✓ Advanced filters on CategoryPage - Availability filter (En stock, En promotion)
✓ Advanced filters on CategoryPage - Size filter section
✓ Advanced filters on CategoryPage - Sort dropdown with 6 options
✓ Order tracking page /suivi-commande accessible and functional
✓ Order tracking form with order_id and email inputs
✓ Order tracking error handling for non-existent orders
✓ Product reviews section visible on ProductPage
✓ Reviews show rating summary, distribution bars, individual reviews
✓ Reviews show verified purchase badge and helpful count
✓ 'Suivi de commande' link present in footer under ENTREPRISE
✓ Legal pages accessible: /cgv (Conditions Générales de Vente)
critical_code_review_comments: Category route is /category/:categoryId (English), not /categorie/ (French) - consider adding French route alias for consistency with French UI
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Existing products have brand, colors, sizes fields for filters.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 1 features are complete and working. Category page filters work with /category/:categoryId route. Products have brand (Apple, Samsung), colors (Noir, Blanc, Gris, Jaune, Argent), and sizes fields. Order tracking endpoint at /api/orders/track requires order_id and email params. Reviews endpoint at /api/products/{product_id}/reviews returns reviews with distribution stats.

mocked_apis.PayTech: Payment integration is in test mode (100 FCFA amounts)

advanced_filters.price: 6 price ranges from 'Tous les prix' to 'Plus de 1 000 000 FCFA'
advanced_filters.colors: Color swatches for Noir, Blanc, Gris, Jaune, Argent
advanced_filters.availability: En stock uniquement, En promotion checkboxes
advanced_filters.sizes: Size filter section (XS to XXL, shoe sizes)
advanced_filters.sort: 6 sort options (Plus récents, Prix croissant/décroissant, Nom A-Z/Z-A, Populaires)

order_tracking.form: Order ID and email inputs with submit button
order_tracking.error_handling: Shows error message with WhatsApp contact link

product_reviews.section: Avis clients section on product pages
product_reviews.stats: Average rating, total reviews, distribution bars
product_reviews.individual_reviews: User name, date, rating, title, comment, verified badge, helpful count

footer_links.legal_section: LÉGAL section with all 4 legal page links

legal_pages.cgv: /cgv - Conditions Générales de Vente with articles
